data.title: The Official Cure International Information Service 1986 to 2000
data.meta_description: This is the website for the Official Cure information service archives 1986 - 2000 featuring exclusive interviews - Photos and Competitions for Cure fans world wide
data.text:
The Cure's International Information Service published Cure News - a free newsletter sent to fans who supplied a postage paid self-addressed envelope. It ran from 1986-2000.

Each issue was compiled and distributed by Janie Webber and then by Chris White.

Cure News provided everything from information about music releases and concerts, to trivia and the band's answers to questions sent in by fans. A number of limited edition postcards and signed photos were distributed to many lucky fans. Exclusive competition prizes were made available to readers, and access was given to specially produced limited edition releases included the Lost Wishes cassette tape, Five Swing Live CD, and Galore VHS.

When Cure News introduced the Cure Friends section, it became a lifeline for many, allowing fans to communicate with each other from all over the world, long before the advent of the internet and social media. In later issues Stop Press announced special events that fans could attend such as TV shows, premieres, and Cure Drinks; London-based fan meet ups.

The service came to an end in 2000 when it became clear that the internet was only going to make communication between fans and the band easier and faster, and the need for a printed newsletter immediately became obsolete.

This site contains the entire Cure News archive from The International Information Service for you to enjoy again or delve into for the first time.

We hope you enjoy reading it as much as we've enjoyed putting it all together. Do keep checking back, as we are planning to share some of our special personal Treasures in the coming months; plus we have plans to further develop the website by including lots of other Cure related material which we think and hope you'll find interesting!

Please also follow us on Facebook, Twitter & Instagram.

Janie & Chris
